English: There was a crow which was very thirsty. He searched for water every where. At least he saw a   pot near a well.
He looked inside the pot. There was a little water in the pot. The crow saw some stones nearby.He thought of a plan. He picked up some stones.
He put them one by one into the pot. The water level in the pot came up. The crow drank the   water and flew away happily.

Hindi: रक्षा बंधन की बधाईRaksha Bandhan ki badhai
